title: Kerrville police make arrest in shooting of 7-year-old girl
content:
Kerrville police announced Wednesday that they have made an arrest in the October shooting of a 7-year-old girl.
Leroy Carrizales was arrested Tuesday on a charge of aggravated assault causing serious bodily injury, according to a press release made available on the Kerrville Police Department’s Facebook page.
A 7-year-old girl was shot in the head on Oct. 1 at the intersection of Paschal Avenue and Schreiner Street. The investigation into the shooting is ongoing, according to the release.
Anyone with information is asked to call the Kerr County Crime Stoppers at 830-896-8477 or at 1-877-491-2189 or via www.tipsubmit.com.
